definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.english: She lived in a house that was as old as Alabama.
sentences.chinese: 她家的房子和亞拉巴馬州一樣老。

sentences.english: This user lives in the state of Alabama .
sentences.chinese: 這個用戶現在居住在亞拉巴馬州。

sentences.english: Well, she lived in a house that was as old as Alabama.
sentences.chinese: 她家的房子和亞拉巴馬州一樣老。

sentences.english: The auctioneer was a silver-tongued man from Alabama.
sentences.chinese: 那位拍賣商是一位出生於亞拉巴馬州的雄辯家。

sentences.english: The strike first started in Alabama.
sentences.chinese: 罷工是先從亞拉巴馬州開始的。
